{"id":1404260642,"question_id":172,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 months, 1 week","timestamp":1727464918,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1404260642/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Factorial Trailing Zeroes","memory":"7.7 MB","code":"/*\nGiven an integer n, return the number of trailing zeroes in n!.\nNote that n! = n * (n - 1) * (n - 2) * ... * 3 * 2 * 1.\n*/\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    int trailingZeroes(int n) {\n        // pairs of (2, 5)\n        // number of 10: 1 *2    1*5\n        int num5 = 0;\n        while(n != 0 ) {\n            n = n/5;\n            num5 += n;\n        };\n        return num5;        \n\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"factorial-trailing-zeroes","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
